name: Dinosaur Shooting: Deadly Snip
description:
Go go! You're a hero survivor walking in an incredible in big deadly world of forest, where your mission is to stay alive and Deadly Survival in this deadly park.

Features:
First Person Sniper 3D Shooting
Efficient Weapon Control & Zoom
New Jungle / Forest environment
Efficient gun control
Enemy AI (Artificial Intelligence)
Many mission with different tasks
Thrilling game and exciting
Fun and joy of hunting
Smooth Controls
